name: revelation-dance
effect: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
short_effect: Has the same type as the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
